snippet.title: Xexex (ゼクセクス). [Arcade - Konami]. (1991). Full Playthrough.
snippet.description:
.Xexex - Konami.
.Played by PiE. - "July 4th, 2022".
.
.Wiki. - "Released as Orius in North America, is a 1991 side-scrolling shoot 'em up arcade game by Konami. It draws on Irem's R-Type and Konami's other shoot 'em up Gradius, while adding the tentacle mechanics of Irem's other shoot 'em up XMultiply. It did not see a home port until 2007, when it was included in the compilation Salamander Portable, released only in Japan for the PlayStation Portable.
In the Japanese version, the player starts with the Proton Laser, a thin stream of weak bullets. Defeating certain enemies will drop other weapons. The name of the current weapon is displayed at the bottom of the screen.".
.
#retrogaming 
#xexex
#konami
